headline: Action Might Be Needed to Steady U.K. Gilt Market
summary: Yields on gilts haven’t reached unsustainable levels, but action needs to be taken to steady markets—potentially by the BOE—Mediolanum International Funds said, adding that the rise isn’t happening independently of trends in other government-bond markets.
